entry.title: Bamboo Straw - Single
entry.summary:
Vendor: Sip Naked
Type: Bamboo Straws
Price: 1.50

Sip Naked believes in sustainable living. They encourage everyone to not only practice the 3 Rs, but to reinforce that the first R is reduce. Recycling is a last resort, used only when we are no longer able to reduce or reuse.

Bamboo is naturally anti-microbial and anti-bacterial. It requires no irrigation or pesticides.

Bamboo is ideal for hot and cold drinks because bamboo is temperature resistant. No matter what your drinking—a warm cup of tea, piping hot chocolate, or an icy cold drink—our bamboo straws make it easy to enjoy any beverage while being environmentally conscious.

Each straw is made in China from moso bamboo and the boxes are made and printed in British Columbia.

entry.title: Bamboo Smoothie Straws - Pack of 2
entry.summary:
Vendor: allBambu
Type: Bamboo Straws
Price: 5.00

  • A perfect zero-waste alternative to plastic straws!

  • Made from organically grown bamboo, these straws are reusable, zero-plastic, vegan, 100% biodegradable

  • Great for parties, home & office use and even ideal to carry with you on the go

  • Ideal for all type of drinks - Hot and Cold

  • Superior option to paper & stainless-steel straws

Cleaning and Maintenance

These straws are made from 100% natural bamboo and should be cleaned before using. Keep dry when not in use. 

Product Specifications

  • Length: 19.5 cm
  • Width: 8mm -10 mm
  • Cleaner included
  • Hand wash recommended
